page.title: 13A FENLAND GAMEKEEPER'S DAY
page.content: I get up at four, have a cup of tea, feed the chickens and ducks, then I go to the rearing field and feed the pheasants. Then I let them into the bigger pens. Next I feed the bigger ducks on the water at Fletchers. I come home, go to bed for two hours and wake Sally up at seven o'clock. At 8.15 I take Sally to school and get the newspapers and read them. Then I have a look round the farm and check the traps to see if there is anything in them. Then I come home and go to sleep. When I wake up I go to see Malcolm to tell him if I need anything. When Sally comes home I take her to see the birds. Then we have some tea and watch television. Then I go and look round and when I come home I get changed and go to the Ex-Service men's club. When I come home I go and shut up the pheasants and ducks.
